description:
Using the latest nova Essex commit 613d1dbc87d9af5d07dc277f0264d6fe1e2e073b.

Nova now requires python-mox to be installed at runtime. It should not.

See this bug for reference:

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/852095
title: nova requires python-mox at runtime

comments.content:

See this bug for reference:

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/852095
